text: Jack Clark may refer to: *Jack Clark (baseball) (born 1955), Major League Baseball player *Jack Clark (rugby union), American rugby coach and former rugby union player *Jack Clark (television personality) (1925–1988), American television game show host and announcer *Jack J. Clark (1879–1947), American actor and director *Jack Clark (footballer) (1924-2012), Australian footballer *Jack Clark (cricketer) (born 1994), English cricketer ==See also== *Jack Clarke (disambiguation) *John Clark (disambiguation)
title: Jack Clark
